title: Boolean Expressions and While Loops
description:
In the next exercise, you will look into making a while loop. Before this next step, remind yourself how boolean expressions work because while loops use them.

Read through this program and add the correct output statement for each of the four results.
hint: This program unrolls a while loop with a counter. Place four of the output blocks into the program. If you have not found the correct solution, edit the output statement to display each result variable, output result_1.
